features: 🏆【Latest Metal Phone Tripod Mount】: 360° rotation smartphone holder with 2 side cold shoe and 1 back cold shoe & 1/4" Expand Hole Design, you can attach additional LED light, microphone or other film device. It helps you film steady vlogging video for Facebook, Youtube, and platforms as well as live streaming channels.

🏆【Back Cold Shoe & Two 1/4" Expand Hole Design】: There is a cold shoe on the back, which solves the problem that the wireless microphone cannot be fixed during mobile phone recording. Two 1/4" screw hole help you expand the devices you want.

🏆【Standard Arca Mount on Bottom】- ULANZI Iron Man IV with a standard Aka quick release plate port, quick installation. A 1/4 screw port is added at the bottom to connect tripods. It is all aluminum metal made. Solid, Durable and Safer.
🏆【Side Double Cold Shoe Design】: ULANZI ST-27 with 2 cold shoes on the side, you can mount your fill light & microphone at same time. It is be the best choice for your vlog.

🏆【Extra Wide Compatibility】: Ulanzi phone tripod mount compatible with iPhone 12/12Pro/12Pro Max/11/11Pro/11Pro Max/X/Xs/XR/Xs Max,8/7/6/6s, iPhone 6/6s plus, iphone SE,Samsung Galaxy s10s10 plus S9/S9+,S8/S8+/S7/S6/S6 edge, Note 10 9 8 5 4 3 and many other brands and models
body.description: ULANZI ST-27 Iron Man IV The most powerful smartphone holder with 3 Cold Shoe Mount ULANZI ST-27 Iron Man IV is the latest metal phone tripod mount. It is made of high quality aircraft grade aluminum and is well balanced and comfortable to touch for most smartphones. If you are interested in filmmaking, you can equip your phone with a sturdy phone tripod adapter screw/cold shoe design to meet the needs of serious smartphone photographers and videographers.These will help you film steady vlogging video for Facebook, Youtube, and platforms as well as live streaming channels. It made of high quality aircraft grade aluminum The back cold shoe & two 1/4 ports can add more peripherals 2 side cold shoes can add a microphone and a fill light at same time The bottom 1/4" and arca port are suitable for various professional tripod devices. 360° rotatable, easily swapping horizontal and vertical angles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great low cost tripod phone mount
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this tripod phone mount and I'm extremely impressed with its quality and functionality. It securely accommodates my iPhone 14 Max, thanks to its robust spring grips. The design includes two cold shoe mounts - ideal for attaching a flash or mic - and a pair of 1/4"-20 screw mounts on the back, useful for wireless mic receivers or similar accessories. This versatile mount fits any tripod with a standard 1/4"-20 thread screw attachment. Concerns about the inability to lock the vertical-horizontal rotation are misplaced; the functionality is there, suggesting that those experiencing issues may have defective units or a misunderstanding of the instructions. Additionally, some users have mentioned difficulties in rotating the mount to a vertical position when the phone is centered. The solution is simple: just offset the phone in the clamp.Overall, this mount is a remarkable blend of durability, thoughtful design, and lightweight construction. Don't let a few negative reviews deter you; this product is truly top-notch and exceeds expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PICTRON Metal Phone Tripod Mount: The Sturdy Companion for Your Cinematic Endeavors
reviews.reviewText: The PICTRON Metal Phone Tripod Mount, featuring 3 cold shoes and an Arca port, is not just a tripod mount; it's a professional-grade tool for elevating your smartphone videography. Designed to hold the iPhone 15 Pro Max securely, this mount transforms your phone into a steady, versatile camera ready for any filming scenario. It's like giving your phone superpowers to capture life's moments with cinematic precision.First and foremost, the build quality of this mount is exceptional. Crafted from metal, it provides a sturdiness and reliability that plastic mounts can't match. The mount grips your iPhone 15 Pro Max with the confidence of a seasoned filmmaker, ensuring your device is safe and secure, no matter the angle or intensity of the shoot.The 360° rotation feature is a standout. It offers unparalleled flexibility, allowing you to switch between landscape and portrait modes effortlessly. Whether you're shooting a vlog, a time-lapse, or a panoramic scene, this mount adapts to your creative needs without missing a beat.The inclusion of 3 cold shoes is a game-changer for creators who use additional accessories like microphones, lights, or other gear. This feature turns your smartphone setup into a mini professional studio, ready to capture high-quality content wherever you go. It's like having a Swiss Army knife for your phone - multifunctional and ready for any challenge.The Arca port integration is another thoughtful addition, making the mount compatible with a wide range of tripods and stabilizers. This universal compatibility ensures that you can use the mount with your existing equipment, making it a versatile addition to your gear.The mount's compatibility with the iPhone 15 Pro Max is particularly impressive. It accommodates the phone's size and weight perfectly, providing a stable base for capturing steady, blur-free videos. Whether you're an aspiring filmmaker, a content creator, or just someone who loves to record life's moments, this mount enhances your phone's capabilities significantly.TL;DR: The PICTRON Metal Phone Tripod Mount is an essential tool for anyone looking to take their iPhone videography to the next level. Its sturdy build, 360° rotation capability, multiple accessory mounts, and universal tripod compatibility make it a versatile and reliable choice for capturing high-quality video content. This mount is not just a piece of equipment; it's a partner in your creative journey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great design ….worth every penny!
reviews.reviewText: As an engineer this item is well designed and quality is outstanding… the all metal design and multiple features make it the best I’ve seen…easy to use and holds phone very securely. Forget all the plastic designs ….buy this one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great quality. Metal and durable. Good for cameras however I used with Ulanzi MT 34 and the phone holder did not screw into tripod securely. The trios does come with its own phone holder built into MT 34- good quality but for me prefer the function of this phone holder as u can twist and rotate with having to unscrew and tighten every time u want to take a selfie MT 34. Need phone adjustments quickly and this phone holder is perfect but does not tighten securely (my opinion) into MT34Both high quality good fit for XLR and GoPro but not when I used the ST 22 or 27it comes with a built in phone holder but I want to use one with more options of 360’ and boots for microphoneVery lightweight and comfortable compared to the round plastic sticks. Great if I had a camera but not for my hiking

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very well made but phone spring is very strong
reviews.reviewText: Bought this smartphone tripod mount to replace a cheap plastic part that broke on my ring light. This is extremely well made of aluminum and finely machined. A bit heavy but OK on my ring light. The only issue is a WAY too strong phone mount. The spring to hold the phone cannot be opened without 2 hands - exerting a lot of pressure. I have an iPhone Max which is pretty wide and it is a challenge to mount the phone. Works great and easy to adjust when phone is mounted. Recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for self portrait
reviews.reviewText: I order this iPhone holder because I wanted to take some creative self portrait, we much I could not do living alone. It is sturdy, held the phone in place. Easy operation. I think it is a fair price for such a great product. This thing will outlast my phone. Great product, great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mount is solid aluminum construction and is very sturdy.Nice ball detents at the 90* positions to help with positioning the phone. The black knurled ring on the back locks the swivel into position.The springs in the clamp section are strong, but not overbearing and there is a lock mechanism (red dial in the pictures) that you can use to lock the clamp in position to prevent it from being bumped open and dropping the phone.The threads for the tripod screw (3 sets on this mount) are well-machined and thread on easily.There are 3 cold-shoe mounts as well on various parts of the mount. Machining is very clean on these as well.Well-made rubber grips in the jaws of the clamp help grip and protect the phone.Overall, one of the best accessories I've purchased. Definitely 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits standard Acri Swiss quick release and has stop at 90 degrees!
reviews.reviewText: Beautifully made and very sturdy, this phone/tripod adapter is terrific. It holds my iPhone 15 pro very securely and has indents at 90 and 180. Most importantly for me, it fits a standard Acra Swiss quick release on my tripods. made out of aluminum it should has a long time.
Producto robusto, gran calidad, ajuste perfecto. Muy recomendable. Sin duda es una buena compra.
Produto tem boa qualidade e parece durável, lembrou a qualidade de produtos da SmallRig, estou muito satisfeito

reviews.reviewTitle: Great all around! It's wicked awesome!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent quality, works well with Samsung S23 Ultra
reviews.reviewText: Got this to allow me to put S23U on a tripod. Its really high quality and works well.
Välbyggd som ett smycke och fungerar riktigt bra på min iPhone 14 Pro Max med skyddsfodral.
